description.zh-cn: 指冷战期间中华人民共和国和苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟发生的外交、军事关系上的疏远甚至对峙冲突，分歧同时覆盖国家利益和意识形态层面。
description.en: Refers to the deterioration of political and ideological relations between the People's Republic of China and the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics during the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The founding father of the People's Republic of China and a key leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林逝世后的苏联主要领导人，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会第一书记和苏联部长会议主席。
description.en: The primary leader of the Soviet Union after Stalin's death, serving as the First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and Chairman of the Council of Ministers.

nodes.id: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 存在于1922年至1991年的欧亚大陆北部的社会主义国家，是当时世界上的两个超级大国之一。
description.en: A socialist state in Northern Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991, one of the two superpowers of its time.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A socialist state in Asia governed by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大后发起的一系列旨在否定和清除斯大林时期政治与意识形态影响的改革运动。
description.en: A series of political reforms in the Soviet Union after the 20th Congress of the CPSU, aimed at repudiating and removing the political and ideological influence of the Stalin era.

nodes.id: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

zh-cn: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会
en: 20th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党的一次重要代表大会，赫鲁晓夫在此次会议上发表了批判斯大林的“秘密报告”。
description.en: A significant congress of the CPSU where Khrushchev delivered his "Secret Speech" criticizing Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 指1950年代末期中国共产党在中国大陆推行的“社会主义建设总路线、大跃进、人民公社”三项政策和运动。
description.en: Refers to the three policies and movements promoted by the CCP in mainland China in the late 1950s: the General Line for Socialist Construction, the Great Leap Forward, and the People's Commune.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫提出的苏联外交政策，主张与资本主义国家“和平共处、和平竞赛、和平过渡”。
description.en: A Soviet foreign policy proposed by Khrushchev, advocating for "peaceful coexistence, peaceful competition, and peaceful transition" with capitalist countries.

en: Nine Commentaries on the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 1963年至1964年间，中国共产党为回应苏联共产党的《公开信》而发表的九篇评论文章，标志着中苏论战的顶峰。
description.en: A series of nine articles published by the CCP between 1963 and 1964 in response to the CPSU's "Open Letter", marking the peak of the Sino-Soviet polemics.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 苏联共产党第二十二次代表大会

zh-cn: 苏联共产党第二十二次代表大会
en: 22nd Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党的一次代表大会，会上苏共公开批判阿尔巴尼亚劳动党，并决定将斯大林遗体移出列宁墓。
description.en: A congress of the CPSU where the party openly criticized the Party of Labour of Albania and decided to remove Stalin's body from Lenin's Mausoleum.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国大陆发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中苏交恶期间，中华人民共和国与苏联在两国边境发生的一系列军事对峙和武装冲突。
description.en: A series of military standoffs and armed clashes between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union along their shared border during the Sino-Soviet split.

description.zh-cn: 1969年3月发生于乌苏里江珍宝岛的中苏大规模武装冲突，是中苏边界冲突中最著名的事件。
description.en: A large-scale armed conflict between China and the Soviet Union on Zhenbao Island in the Ussuri River in March 1969, the most famous incident in the Sino-Soviet border conflict.

description.zh-cn: 美国第37任总统。
description.en: The 37th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于北美的联邦共和国，是当时世界上的两个超级大国之一。
description.en: A federal republic in North America, one of the two superpowers of its time.

description.zh-cn: 1971年7月，时任美国国家安全顾问基辛格秘密访问中国，为尼克松访华铺平了道路。
description.en: In July 1971, then-U.S. National Security Advisor Henry Kissinger secretly visited China, paving the way for Nixon's visit.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交家、政治家，曾任美国国家安全顾问和国务卿。
description.en: An American diplomat and political scientist who served as United States Secretary of State and National Security Advisor.

description.zh-cn: 1972年2月，时任美国总统尼克松访问中国，是中美关系正常化的重要一步。
description.en: In February 1972, then-U.S. President Nixon visited China, an important step in the normalization of Sino-U.S. relations.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1970年代提出的外交战略构想，主张联合美国、日本、西欧等国家，形成一条线，共同对付苏联的扩张。
description.en: A foreign policy strategy conceived by Mao Zedong in the 1970s, advocating for a united front including the United States, Japan, and Western Europe to form a line against Soviet expansionism.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second generation of Chinese Communist Party leadership and the chief architect of China's reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 1979年中华人民共和国与越南社会主义共和国之间爆发的边境战争。
description.en: A border war fought in 1979 between the People's Republic of China and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 苏联于1979年入侵阿富汗引发的战争。
description.en: The war triggered by the Soviet Union's invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫之后的苏联最高领导人，曾任苏共中央总书记。
description.en: The paramount leader of the Soviet Union after Khrushchev, serving as General Secretary of the CPSU.

nodes.id: 米哈伊尔·谢尔盖耶维奇·戈尔巴乔夫

zh-cn: 米哈伊尔·谢尔盖耶维奇·戈尔巴乔夫

description.zh-cn: 苏联最后一任最高领导人，曾任苏共中央总书记。
description.en: The last leader of the Soviet Union, serving as General Secretary of the CPSU.

nodes.id: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

zh-cn: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

description.zh-cn: 列宁之后的苏联最高领导人，曾任苏共中央总书记。
description.en: The paramount leader of the Soviet Union after Lenin, serving as General Secretary of the CPSU.

nodes.id: 中苏友好同盟互助条约

zh-cn: 中苏友好同盟互助条约
en: Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Alliance and Mutual Assistance

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与苏联于1950年签订的军事同盟条约。
description.en: A military alliance treaty signed in 1950 between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1957年10月中苏签订的协定，规定苏联向中国提供原子能、导弹等多方面的援助。
description.en: An agreement signed in October 1957 between China and the Soviet Union, stipulating Soviet assistance to China in areas such as atomic energy and missiles.

description.zh-cn: 中国第一个核武器研制计划的代号。
description.en: The codename for China's first nuclear weapons development program.

description.zh-cn: 与赫鲁晓夫相关的去斯大林化政策以及和平共处理论。
description.en: The policies of de-Stalinization and the theory of peaceful coexistence associated with Khrushchev.

description.zh-cn: 位于南亚的国家。
description.en: A country in South Asia.

description.zh-cn: 1969年8月13日中苏在新疆铁列克提地区发生的边境武装冲突。
description.en: A border armed conflict between China and the Soviet Union in the Tieleketi region of Xinjiang on August 13, 1969.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，曾长期担任苏联部长会议主席。
description.en: A Soviet statesman who served for a long time as the Chairman of the Council of Ministers of the Soviet Union.

nodes.id: 罗季翁·雅科夫列维奇·马利诺夫斯基

zh-cn: 罗季翁·雅科夫列维奇·马利诺夫斯基

description.zh-cn: 苏联元帅，曾任苏联国防部长。
description.en: A Marshal of the Soviet Union who served as Minister of Defence of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1989年5月，时任苏共中央总书记戈尔ба乔夫访问中国，标志着中苏关系正常化。
description.en: In May 1989, then-General Secretary of the CPSU Gorbachev visited China, marking the normalization of Sino-Soviet relations.

relationships.source: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上发表批判斯大林的“秘密报告”，开启“去斯大林化”，引发了毛泽东等中共高层的不满，成为中苏交恶的缘起。
description.en: Khrushchev's "Secret Speech" criticizing Stalin at the 20th CPSU Congress initiated "de-Stalinization," which caused dissatisfaction among Mao Zedong and other high-level CCP leaders, becoming the origin of the Sino-Soviet split.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫的“去斯大林化”做法让毛泽东感到不满，并担心中共党内会出现“中国的赫鲁晓夫”对自己进行全面否定，成为中苏交恶的关键原因之一。
description.en: Khrushchev's "de-Stalinization" dissatisfied Mao Zedong, who feared that a "Chinese Khrushchev" might emerge within the CCP to repudiate him, becoming a key reason for the Sino-Soviet split.

description.zh-cn: 自1956年苏共二十大后，赫鲁晓夫与毛泽东在意识形态、国家政策和国际共运路线等问题上产生严重分歧，相互批判，导致两国关系破裂。
description.en: Since the 20th CPSU Congress in 1956, Khrushchev and Mao Zedong had serious disagreements on ideology, national policy, and the line of the international communist movement, leading to mutual criticism and the rupture of relations between the two countries.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党反对苏共二十大以来赫鲁晓夫主义的“两全路线”以及“阶级斗争熄灭论”，并认为这是修正主义。
description.en: The CCP opposed the "two alls line" and the "theory of the dying out of class struggle" of Khrushchevism since the 20th CPSU Congress, considering it revisionism.

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党和赫鲁晓夫对中国国内的“三面红旗”运动（总路线、大跃进、人民公社）持反对和批评态度。
description.en: The CPSU and Khrushchev held an opposing and critical stance towards China's domestic "Three Red Banners" movement (the General Line, the Great Leap Forward, and the People's Communes).

relationships.source: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 苏联政府正式照会中国外交部，决定召回全部在华工作的1390名苏联专家，并终止了数百份经济和科技合作合同，使中苏关系走向破裂。
description.en: The Soviet government officially notified the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs of its decision to recall all 1390 Soviet experts working in China and terminated hundreds of economic and technological cooperation contracts, leading to the rupture of Sino-Soviet relations.

relationships.target: 苏联共产党第二十二次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在苏共二十二大上，因苏共公开批判阿尔巴尼亚，中共代表团团长周恩来当场予以驳斥，并率团提前回国以示抗议。
description.en: At the 22nd CPSU Congress, due to the CPSU's public criticism of Albania, Zhou Enlai, head of the CCP delegation, refuted it on the spot and led the delegation to return to China early in protest.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，毛泽东号召“反苏修”，中苏两国关系彻底冻结，冲突升级。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Mao Zedong called for "opposing Soviet revisionism," which completely froze Sino-Soviet relations and escalated the conflict.

description.zh-cn: 珍宝岛事件是中苏边界冲突中规模最大、最激烈的武装冲突，导致两国关系紧张到核战争边缘。
description.en: The Zhenbao Island incident was the largest and most intense armed conflict in the Sino-Soviet border dispute, pushing relations between the two countries to the brink of nuclear war.

relationships.source: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 在1969年珍宝岛事件后，苏联军方强硬派主张对中国进行核打击，并向美国试探其态度，使两国濒临核战争。
description.en: After the Zhenbao Island incident in 1969, hardliners in the Soviet military advocated for a nuclear strike against China and sounded out the United States' attitude, bringing the two countries to the brink of nuclear war.

relationships.target: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 在苏联考虑对中国进行核打击时，时任美国总统尼克松及其政府进行了干预，向苏联表明美国不会容忍此类行为，从而阻止了潜在的核攻击。
description.en: When the Soviet Union considered a nuclear strike against China, then-U.S. President Nixon and his administration intervened, indicating to the Soviets that the U.S. would not tolerate such an action, thereby preventing a potential nuclear attack.

description.zh-cn: 面对苏联的严重军事和核威胁，毛泽东等中共领导层开始谋求与美国发展关系，最终促成了1972年的尼克松访华。
description.en: Facing severe military and nuclear threats from the Soviet Union, Mao Zedong and other CCP leaders began to seek better relations with the United States, ultimately leading to Nixon's visit to China in 1972.

description.zh-cn: 为应对苏联的扩张势头，毛泽东提出了“一条线、一大片”的外交战略构想。
description.en: To counter Soviet expansionism, Mao Zedong proposed the foreign policy strategy of "one line, one large area."

description.zh-cn: 在亲苏的越南入侵亲中的柬埔寨后，邓小平在访美后随即发动了对越战争。
description.en: After pro-Soviet Vietnam invaded pro-China Cambodia, Deng Xiaoping launched the war against Vietnam immediately after his visit to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中国强烈谴责苏联入侵阿富汗，并联合美国、巴基斯坦等国支持阿富汗的抵抗运动。
description.en: China strongly condemned the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan and, along with the United States, Pakistan, and other countries, supported the Afghan resistance movement.

description.zh-cn: 1982年，勃列日涅夫在塔什干发表讲话，对中国释放友好信号，被认为是中苏关系解冻的讯号。
description.en: In 1982, Brezhnev delivered a speech in Tashkent sending friendly signals to China, which is considered a sign of a thaw in Sino-Soviet relations.

relationships.source: 米哈伊尔·谢尔盖耶维奇·戈尔ба乔夫

description.zh-cn: 戈尔巴乔夫访问中国，与邓小平等人会面，中苏关系在历经三十年恶化后得以正常化。
description.en: Gorbachev visited China and met with Deng Xiaoping and others, normalizing Sino-Soviet relations after three decades of deterioration.

description.zh-cn: 在中共早期，斯大林不信任毛泽东，支持“二十八个半布尔什维克”等苏联路线的领导人，并将毛泽东排除在中央委员会之外。
description.en: In the early days of the CCP, Stalin distrusted Mao Zedong, supported leaders who followed the Soviet line, such as the "28 Bolsheviks," and excluded Mao from the Central Committee.

relationships.source: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 苏联以正在谈判禁止核试验条约为由，暂缓向中国提供核武器样品和技术资料，撕毁了《中苏国防新技术协定》。
description.en: Citing ongoing negotiations for a nuclear test ban treaty, the Soviet Union suspended the provision of nuclear weapon samples and technical data to China, tearing up the 'Sino-Soviet Agreement on New Technology for National Defense'.

relationships.source: 罗季翁·雅科夫列维奇·马利诺夫斯基

description.zh-cn: 在一次招待会上，苏联国防部长马利诺夫斯基对贺龙元帅提出“我们已经赶走了赫鲁晓夫，也该你们赶走毛泽东了”，导致中苏短暂的和解尝试彻底破裂。
description.en: At a reception, Soviet Minister of Defense Malinovsky suggested to Marshal He Long, "We have already ousted Khrushchev, it's your turn to oust Mao Zedong," causing the brief attempt at Sino-Soviet reconciliation to completely fail.

description.zh-cn: 在参加胡志明葬礼后，柯西金路过北京并与周恩来在机场举行秘密会晤，使因珍宝岛事件而极度紧张的中苏关系稍有缓和。
description.en: After attending Ho Chi Minh's funeral, Kosygin made a stopover in Beijing and held a secret meeting with Zhou Enlai at the airport, slightly easing the extremely tense Sino-Soviet relations caused by the Zhenbao Island incident.

relationships.source: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 在1962年中印边境战争期间，苏联选择与美国一道支持印度，反对中国。
description.en: During the 1962 Sino-Indian War, the Soviet Union chose to support India along with the United States, against China.
